New Records: Nikola Jokic secured his 144th career triple-double.
The Nuggets finished a perfect 21 of 21 from the free throw line.
The Nuggets set a season-high in assists with 44.
Young now has five or more assists in 193 straight regular season games, the third-longest streak in NBA history.
Key Match Events: Nikola Jokic had 23 points, 17 rebounds, and 15 assists.
Russell Westbrook added 16 points and 11 assists.
The Nuggets broke open the game with a 39-14 run in the third quarter.
Trae Young was called for a technical foul during the third quarter run.
De'Andre Hunter drew a technical foul for flopping.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Nuggets won their third straight game.
The Nuggets finished 2-0 against the Hawks this season.
Atlanta saw its four-game win streak halted.
The Nuggets had seven players finish in double figures.
Westbrook continues to add a spark to the starting lineup with Aaron Gordon sidelined by a strained right calf.
